8
9#ifndef BASE64_H
10#define BASE64_H
11
12unsigned char * base64_encode(const unsigned char *src, size_t len,
13 size_t *out_len);
14unsigned char * base64_decode(const unsigned char *src, size_t len,
15 size_t *out_len);
16unsigned char * base64_url_encode(const unsigned char *src, size_t len,
17 size_t *out_len, int add_pad);
18unsigned char * base64_url_decode(const unsigned char *src, size_t len,
19 size_t *out_len);
20
21#endif /* BASE64_H */
